Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Vázquez Soto González on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Vázquez Soto González is a seasoned professional with over 35 years of experience.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Vázquez Soto González and Carmen tied the knot in 2002. Vázquez and Carmen have 1 child, named Muñoz.
Education Background:
Vázquez earned his secondary school diploma from Instituto de Educación Secundaria IES Ramiro de Maeztu Madrid in 1984.
Vázquez received his degree from University of Valencia in 1989.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 35 years, Vázquez Soto González has established himself as a key player in the industry.
In 1990, Vázquez Soto González started working as a Research Scientist at Esteve Teijin Healthcare S.L., marking the beginning of his successful career.
At PharmaMar S.A., he held the position of Clinical Trials Manager from 1997 to 1998, making significant contributions to the organization.
He spent 25 years working as a Regulatory Affairs Director at Almirall S.A., refining his expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 750000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns condo in Málaga, where he resides. It is worth 1060000 EUR.

He inherited 570000 EUR from his grandfather, a well-known Private Equity Manager, in 2012, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: In summary, Vázquez has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
